citation: Proclamation under the Justice (Delegated Legislation) Act 2003 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Justice (Delegated Legislation) Act 2003

I, the Administrator in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Justice (Delegated Legislation) Act 2003 fix 1 July 2003 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

2 June 2003

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Administrator

By His Excellency's Command,

JUDY JACKSON

Minister for Justice and Industrial Relations

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 11 June 2003

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice and Industrial Relations.
